item.title: Happy New Year!
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ basibanget Ready for a new year of tango? Remember that if you want to improve, there is no secret, all you have to do is to follow three simple steps: Learn from the best Practice (a lot) Listen to lots of music Nobody ever said it was gonna be easy ;-)
